promptPrefix:
Your task is to create 5 blog topics based on the criteria I provide to you. These titles need to be original, attention grabbing, and optimized for SEO. I will be providing you a business name, location, and industry in the [PROMPT]. All outputs are to be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

The title for each blog should be either informative, or in the form of a relevant question we can answer in the blog iteself. 

In addition to each blog topic, please provide 2 relevant informational and transactional keywords that are relevant to the business/industry. 

Please also create a 2-3 sentence guide outlining how each topic should be written. 

These blogs will be limited to 1000 characters, so please choose topics accordingly.
title: SEO Optimized Blog Topics v.2
